name: ACL Rights - internal reference
title: ACL Rights - internal reference
body:
Overview

ACL is the abbreviation for "Access Control List". In EFS there are different rights ordered by EFS module that can be granted on team base and give this team read and write access to features and functions in EFS. Besides the ACL team rights there also are object rights (e.g. on mail templates or projects etc.).

ACL rights for EFS Survey

NAME

DESCRIPTION

Rights related to project management

archive_project

With read rights, you can archive projects and use the archive.

chg_url

With write rights, you can change the URL of a project.

cr_language

With write rights, you can create a new language.

cr_project

With write rights, you can create or copy new projects and change the basic characteristics of a project. Furthermore, write rights for cr_project are a necessary requirement for granting project import with import_project.

ct42partadm

With read rights, you can view the participants list in participant administration. Furthermore, you gain access to data import (import for externally-collected data in personalized surveys and employee surveys). In EFS Survey Status, you gain access to respondent export. With write rights, you can create, edit or delete participants.

del_project

With write rights, you can assign the status "erasable" to projects. Please note: The status "erasable" has been removed. Therefore, this right is currently without effect.

export_with_lfdn

With read rights, you can access and use the combined export of participant and result data in personalized surveys. You can also view the combined data in the menu "Statistics"->"Detail view". Furthermore, when exporting the project, you may optionally include the result data, e.g. if a project needs to be moved to another EFS installation.

import_project

With read rights, you can import projects. Please note: write rights for cr_project are a necessary requirement.

monitor_mode

With read rights, you can use the monitoring mode in personalized surveys, panel surveys and master data surveys. Please mind that the monitoring feature is deprecated in 10.0 and will be dropped in the next release.

print_survey

With read rights, you can print the survey.

protect_questions

With read rights, you can view and export the results of protected questions. With write rights, you can mark questions as "protected".

quotation_admin

With read rights, you can check the quota statistics in the field report. With write rights, you can use the project quotas.

r_without_deleting

With read rights, you can access the option "Reset without deleting survey data" in participant administration.

show_dispcode

With read rights, you can view and export the disposition code of survey participants. In a personalized survey, the disposition code is shown in participant administration. In a panel survey, it is shown in the respective sample on the tab "Sample contents".

show_export

With read rights, you can access the "Export" menu of specific projects.

Rights related to mail dispatch functions

mail_admin

With read rights, you can access the overviews of existing mail templates in the projects and in the "Libraries" module. The mail admin in projects and in the "Libraries" module offers an overview on dispatch processes in areas you're authorized to access (without read rights, you can only your own dispatch processes in mail admin). With read and write rights, all features for editing mail templates are available and you can also access new mail templates.

mail_admin_panel

With read rights, you can view the panel mailings in options > mail report.

mail_admin_system

With read rights, you can view the system mailings in options > mail report.

mail_attachments

With read rights, you can use attachments when sending mails.

mail_cc

With read rights, you can define the additional recipient options CC and BCC in mail templates and mail dispatch processes.

mail_email_mailadmin

With read rights, you can view the e-mail addresses of mails in the mail queue.

mail_email_preview

With read rights, you can view the recipients' e-mail addresses in the mail preview.

mail_passwords

With read rights, you can see the plain text passwords of participants or panelists when previewing mails.

mail_reply

With read rights, you can define the additional options "Reply-To" and "Return-Path" in mail templates and mail dispatch processes.

options

With read rights, you can access the menu "Libraries" -> "Mail templates" -> "Mail senders".

Rights related to statistics and reporting functions

config_fieldreport

With read rights, you can restrict field report, online statistics and open-ended answers to a variable which you can define yourself ("Configuration" button in the respective menus).

data_cleaning

With read rights, you can access the data cleaning.

detail_view_edit

With write rights, you can edit the result data.

digium_reporting

With write rights, you can access the Report Designer.

export_code

With read rights, you can export the participants' access code in the respondent export on EFS Survey Status.

geolocation

With read rights, you can activate the collection of geo-location information and provider data in a project, derived from participants IP addresses. You can access these participant data in the menu "Statistics" -> "Detail view" and via export.

ip_addresses

With read rights, you can activate the collection of hostname and IP address for a project. You can access the hostnames and IP addresses of survey participants in the menu "Statistics" -> "Detail view" and via export. Furthermore, you can change your own preferences for hostname determination in new projects.

participant_details

With read rights, you can activate in a project the collection of extended device information of participants, derived from the browsers user-agent information. You can access this participant data in the menu "Statistics" -> "Detail view" and via export.

quality_correction

With read rights, you can use quality correction (Menu "Statistics" -> "Quality correction").

report_erase_data

With read rights, you can delete the results for selected survey variables for individual or for all participants (Menu "Statistics" -> "Detail view" and "Statistics" -> "Delete data").

report_onlinefiles

With read rights, you can access the uploaded files.

report_onlinerep

With read rights, you can access the open-ended answers (Menu "Statistics" -> "Open-ended answers").

report_onlinereport

With read rights, you can access the conventional EFS Reporting.

report_onlinestat

With read rights, you can access the submenu "Online statistics" in the menu "Statistics".

report_reporting

With write rights, you can access EFS Reporting+.

report_testdata

With read rights, you can access the participants' survey results (Menu "Statistics" -> "Detail view").

report_view_fieldrep

With read rights, you can view the field report (menu "Statistics").

reporting_configuration

Allows access to the Reporting+ configuration area in the platform cockpit. For making changes write access is required.

reporting_configuration_org

Allows access to the Reporting+ configuration area in the organization configuration.

stat_split

With read rights, you can split field report and online statistics.

Rights related to user administration functions

chg_grp_acl

With write rights, you can change the ACL rights of teams.

cr_area_mobile_gui

With write rights, you can assign or change the access rights to the area "EFS Mobile Gui".

cr_area_report

With write rights, you can assign or change the access rights to the area "EFS Survey Status".

cr_area_translations

With write rights, you can assign or change the access rights to the area "EFS Translator Interface".

cr_area_www

With write rights, you can assign or change the access rights to the area "EFS Spring 2016".

cr_teamaccount

With write rights, you can create and edit new user accounts.

groupadmin

With read rights, you can view all teams, including teams you are not a member of. With write rights, you can edit teams (except the team "System administrators") and manage access rights for objects (e.g. projects, reports etc.) for all teams.

org_groupadmin

With read rights, you can access the account data of your own organization's users. With write rights, you can administrate all users of your own organization (e.g. create accounts, edit account data or delete accounts).

orgadmin

With write rights, you can edit the accounting organizations on this installation in the "Users "-> "Organizations" menu. Additionally, you can change the assignment of users and projects to organizations.

Access rights

create_macro

With write rights, you can define new macros and assign the rights to execute them.

create_project_cat

With write rights, you can create new folders for the project list.

domain_redirection

With read rights, you can configure domain redirections. With write rights, you can add further domains.

exchange_teams

With read rights, you can view the history of the exchange platform. With write rights, you can create exchange teams.

platform_cockpit

With read rights, you can access the "Options" -> "Platform cockpit" menu.

questiontype_editor

With write rights, you can access the "Question type editor".

receipt_admin

With read rights, you have access to the receipt admin.

reportlist

With read rights, you can access the field overview in the "Projects" module. Furthermore, if you want to authorize users to access reports or automated exports via EFS Survey Status, these read rights are required as well, in addition to the read rights for the respective report or export file.

show_scala

With read rights, you can access the scale library.

webservice_conf

With write rights, you can activate and configure web services.

whois

With read rights, you can see the active users in the system. With write rights, you can also see which parts of the software the users are currently working in.

Other rights

mms_management

With read rights, you have access to the MMS management and the MMS codings.

Access rights to areas

area_mobile_gui

With write rights, you can access the area "EFS Mobile Gui".

area_report

With write rights, you can access the area "EFS Survey Status".

area_translations

With write rights, you can access the area "EFS Translator Interface".

area_www

With write rights, you can access the area "EFS Spring 2016".
